channel.title: Client-Server Help
channel.description: Okay, so basically i just want the client i have to be able to connect to my server, i dont want anything else to be able to, except for mopar/silab. I've looked up countless things for this... google, searched on here... but i cant find anything. someone please help me. :) thanks. 317 delta.

item.title: Client-Server Help
item.dc:creator: @Kaex Kaex
item.description:
@Kaex wrote:

Just change the ip in the client / port also… (Only port if it isn’t same as server).

Read full topic
